full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference Number
WS4157053178-Doc4157126804

#### Request for Proposal
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals for the procurement of Baseball caps in accordance with RCMP Specification No: G.S.1045-181, dated 2022-04-08.

#### Key Details

*   The procurement is restricted to Canadian goods, as per Article 503.4(b) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.
*   The need for Baseball caps includes options and special orders on an as-needed basis.
*   The proposed procurement is broken into two phases: expression of interest and a subsequent solicitation with detailed specifications.
*   Canada reserves the right to modify, change, or terminate the procurement process at its discretion.

#### Delivery Specifications
The Baseball caps are to be delivered to the RCMP in Ottawa.

#### Procurement Method
This is a competitive bid solicitation with a request for proposal (RFP) as part of the procurement process.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement adheres to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For any questions or inquiries, please contact Ava Parsian, Priestley via email at [ava.parsian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ava.parsian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Notice URL
For more information, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17221849?extsite=MTcyMjE4NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Closing Date
The closing date for this tender is 2023-09-05T14:00:00.

Based on the information provided, I have determined the proposed delivery for the Baseball caps as being sent to the RCMP in Ottawa.
